data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Similar to Class::Loader except a cleaner interface (primary reason
    to implement new), portable, a few more useful methods and not
    specifically designed for dynamic object creation. This will serve
    as a basis for the loading of class/modules at runtime, testing if
    class/module is loaded, calling method/functions of class (including
    object creation) and unloading class/module at runtime. Hopefully
    work on support in a distributed environment for the future : )
